# isEnabled

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the receiver reacts to mouse events.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var isEnabled: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

The value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] if the receiver responds to mouse events; otherwise, [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].
title: isEnabled
